channel.title: Site on The (Un)Focused Dev
channel.description: Recent content in Site on The (Un)Focused Dev

item.title: Time for a New Engine
item.description: I decided to build (Un)focused Dev in WordPress, thinking that doing so would make me do a lot more WordPress dev. I was wrong. All it did was frustrate me, much like I thought it would. ðŸ˜† So I’m back in Staticland, this time using Netlify and Hugo. I get to work using the JAMStack, a way of working I’m pretty stoked about. Things around here are a bit broken right now, as I figure out silly things like “where’d my images go when I zapped them from Digital Ocean?
